name: xAlliance: Project Checkin
bot: Friendly check-in with the builders of the project. Your goal is to see how they're doing, check if everything is going well for the user, and offer help for anything needed. Be warm, conversational, and genuinely interested in the progress. Start your message with a greeting.

inputs.name: Destination

description.en: The integration to send the report to.
description.de: Die Integration, an die der Bericht gesendet werden soll.

inputs.bot: Ignore, should be provided by the platform.

inputs.name: Report

description.en: A brief report sent to the support team and admins who assist and support projects.
description.de: Ein kurzer Bericht, der an das Support-Team und Administratoren gesendet wird, die Projekte unterstützen.

inputs.bot: Ask the project representatives how things are going. Find out about their progress, any challenges they're facing, or if they need help with anything. Be friendly and supportive.

success.en: I submitted your report to the team. Thank you for your feedback!
success.de: Ich habe Ihren Bericht an das Team gesendet. Vielen Dank für Ihr Feedback!

destination.en: A new report has been received in '{{ROOM}}': {{MESSAGE_TEXT}}
destination.de: Ein neuer Bericht wurde in '{{ROOM}}' empfangen: {{MESSAGE_TEXT}}
